item.title: 2 injured as miscreants open fire in Agartala
item.description: 2 injured as miscreants open fire in Agartala Two people sustained bullet injuries after some miscreants fired on six people at the Sonar Bangla dhaba in the Nutan Nagar area of Agartala in Tripura
